desc: Handcrafted wood and pottery gifts. Cutting boards, cheese boards, custom laser engraved boards, charcuterie boards, wooden earrings, pottery, coffee mugs, laser cut earrings, Sky Valley Pottery, LLC

layout.text: We are a small company located in New Braunfels, Texas. We create beautiful, handcrafted cutting boards, charcuterie boards and hand painted porcelain art tiles.
